message.content:
Below is a concise “walk‐through” of how the shown structure is built, following the three required steps.

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
1)  ANALYSIS OF THE TARGET IMAGE
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
• Total Block Count: 13 pieces.  
• Overall Layout:
  – Left Sub‐Structure (3 layers tall, 6 blocks total):
    ◦ Bottom Layer: 2 red arch blocks side by side.  
    ◦ Middle Layer: 2 yellow rectangular blocks bridging across the arches.  
    ◦ Top Layer: 2 more red arch blocks directly above.  
  – Right Sub‐Structure (5 layers tall, 7 blocks total):
    ◦ Bottom Layer: 2 red arch blocks side by side.  
    ◦ Second Layer: 2 small green rectangular blocks (one atop each red arch).  
    ◦ Third Layer: 1 yellow rectangular block spanning the two green blocks.  
    ◦ Fourth Layer: 1 orange cylinder centered on the yellow block.  
    ◦ Fifth Layer: 1 orange “roof” wedge resting on top of the cylinder.  

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
2)  BLOCK‐DICTIONARY SELECTION
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
From the dictionary image (blocks labeled 1–16), the following are needed.  
• Red arch block (#2) – used 6 times (for all red arches).  
• Green rectangular block (#6) – used 2 times (right sub‐structure’s second layer).  
• Yellow rectangular block (#10) – used 3 times (two for the middle layer on the left, one bridging the green blocks on the right).  
• Orange cylinder (#12) – used once (the tall column on the right).  
• Orange roof wedge (#15) – used once (the pyramid‐shaped top piece).  

Important Note: We take the blocks in the orientations exactly as shown (no rotation allowed). Block #2 has the arch opening front‐to‐back, matching the arches in the target image.

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
3)  STEP‐BY‐STEP ASSEMBLY ORDER
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
{
  Step1:  Move block with index 2    //1st red arch (left structure, bottom)
  Step2:  Move block with index 2    //2nd red arch (left structure, bottom)
  Step3:  Move block with index 10   //1st yellow rectangle bridging those arches
  Step4:  Move block with index 10   //2nd yellow rectangle adjacent to the first
  Step5:  Move block with index 2    //3rd red arch on top (left structure)
  Step6:  Move block with index 2    //4th red arch on top (left structure)

  Step7:  Move block with index 2    //5th red arch (right structure, bottom)
  Step8:  Move block with index 2    //6th red arch (right structure, bottom)
  Step9:  Move block with index 6    //1st green rectangle on top of a right-arch
  Step10: Move block with index 6    //2nd green rectangle on top of other right-arch
  Step11: Move block with index 10   //Yellow rectangle spanning the two green blocks
  Step12: Move block with index 12   //Orange cylinder on top of that yellow block
  Step13: Move block with index 15   //Orange roof wedge on top of the cylinder
}

That completes the structure as shown in the target image.
